meanings.definition: The quality or state of being exclusive.
meanings.sent1: The exclusiveness of the club made it feel special.
meanings.sent2: The exclusiveness of the VIP section was evident by the velvet rope.
meanings.sent3: The exclusiveness of the secret handshake made everyone want to join.
meanings.sent4: Her exclusiveness in choosing friends was like a shield against negativity.
meanings.sent5: The exclusiveness of the diamond ring sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The practice of excluding or not admitting others.
meanings.sent1: The exclusiveness of the group led to hurt feelings.
meanings.sent2: The exclusiveness of the event left many disappointed.
meanings.sent3: The exclusiveness of the party made it seem like a mystery club.
meanings.sent4: His exclusiveness in sharing information made him a mysterious figure.
meanings.sent5: The exclusiveness of the invitation list caused quite a stir.
